SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into skill (hero_id, img, `name`, local_name, affects, `desc`, notes, dmg, attrib, cmb, lore, hurl) values (#{heroId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{localName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{affects,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attrib,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) on duplicate key update img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, local_name = #{localName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, affects = #{affects,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dmg = #{dmg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attrib = #{attrib,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cmb = #{cmb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lore = #{lore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hurl = #{hurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update skill set hero_id = #{heroId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, local_name = #{localName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, affects = #{affects,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dmg = #{dmg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attrib = #{attrib,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cmb = #{cmb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lore = #{lore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hurl = #{hurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, hero_id, img, `name`, local_name, affects, `desc`, notes, dmg, attrib, cmb, lore, hurl, create_time, update_time from skill where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, hero_id, img, `name`, local_name, affects, `desc`, notes, dmg, attrib, cmb, lore, hurl, create_time, update_time from skill
mapper.insert:
insert into skill (hero_id, img, `name`, local_name, affects, `desc`, notes, dmg, attrib, cmb, lore, hurl) values
(#{item.heroId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.localName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.affects,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dmg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.attrib,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cmb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.hurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
on duplicate key update img = VALUES(img), `name` = VALUES(`name`), local_name = VALUES(local_name), affects = VALUES(affects), `desc` = VALUES(`desc`), dmg = VALUES(dmg), attrib = VALUES(attrib), cmb = VALUES(cmb), lore = VALUES(lore), hurl = VALUES(hurl)
